snippet.title: Mount & Blade: With Fire and Sword Launch trailer
snippet.description:
Buy the game here: http://www.withfireandswordgame.com/buy
Web page: http://www.withfireandsword.com
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/mountandblade
Twitter: http://twitter.com/mount_and_blade
Forum: http://forum.paradoxplaza.com
Product page: http://www.paradoxplaza.com/games/mountblade-with-fire-and-sword
Mount & Blade: With Fire & Sword is a stand-alone action RPG game based on the engine for the action role-playing game Mount & Blade: Warband. Be a mercenary or join one of the five battling factions to conquer, destroy or create empires.  In an open sand box world you choose your allies, your enemies, what provinces to conquer, what castles to siege and what quests to embark on.
Mount &Blade: With Fire & Sword also builds and expands upon the highly regarded combat system from Mount & Blade: Warband. Firearms have been introduced to the battlefield, opening up exciting new play-styles and options. Players can also utilize explosives for taking out groups of foes or to breach castle walls. In addition to the enhanced single player mode, the game also provides a host of original multiplayer content including the new Captain Mode which allows players to control their own forces in online matches.
The game is a stand-alone game created by the independent developers Sich Studios together with Taleworlds Entertainment based on the Mount & Blade: Warband engine.
Mount & Blade: With Fire & Sword features:
•Introduces firearms
•Multiple storyline quests to undertake
• New Army and Castle/Town upgrade system.
•Enhanced siege mechanics: storm the castle, blow up the wall, bribe an officer or poison the well/food to get past the defenses
•15 new multiplayer maps 
•New Multiplayer mode: Captain. Up to 16 players can each command a squad of soldiers
